header.title: Welcome to SKOS Plugin for Forrest

section.title: Apache Forrest - SKOS Plugin
section.p: Rendering SKOS, a set of specifications to support the representation of thesauri, classification schemes, taxonomies, etc.

section.title: Samples
section.note: This plugin is in an early development stage.
section.p: This section includes samples that have been made available so far to demonstrate the existing functionalities of the plugin.

section.title: Glossary
section.p: This sample generates a glossary from a collection of skos:Concepts written in RDF/XML format.
section.note: We plan to provide a wider support for the format in the near future.
section.p: To retrieve the glossary file in its raw form --SKOS RDF/XML, please request the file samples/glossary-skos/source.xml.
